title: U.S. Tells Citizens to Leave India as Covid Crisis Deepens
content:
1. U.S. Tells Citizens to Leave India as Covid Crisis Deepens  Bloomberg
  2. 'Terrifying' scenes in India as COVID-19 death toll climbs | Coronavirus | 9 News Australia  9 News Australia

  4. Vaccines should be free and for all  The Indian Express
